references.paper_title: Computing large deformation metric mappings via geodesic flows of diffeomorphisms
references.reason: This paper introduces the Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Metric Mapping (LDDMM) framework, which is the foundation for the TS-LDDMM method proposed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Transport par difféomorphismes de points, de mesures et de courants pour la comparaison de formes et l'anatomie numérique
references.reason: This thesis provides the mathematical foundation for LDDMM, a key component of the TS-LDDMM method.

references.paper_title: Large deformation diffeomorphic metric curve mapping
references.reason: This paper extends the LDDMM framework to curves, which is crucial for adapting the method to time series data, represented as curves.

references.paper_title: The varifold representation of nonoriented shapes for diffeomorphic registration
references.reason: This paper introduces the varifold distance, used in the TS-LDDMM method as a loss function for comparing shapes, making it robust to variations in sampling.
This paper introduces Neural ODEs, which provides a related approach to modeling continuous-time systems and shares conceptual similarities with the TS-LDDMM method.
